item.title: Simple Programming
item.description:
We are given a file called data.dat and we are told to count every line that has a number of 0 that is multiple of 3 or that has a number of 1 that is a multiple of 2.

We can take a look at the first lines of the file:

$ head data.dat
0001100000101010100 
110101000001111
101100011001110111
0111111010100
1010111111100011
1110011110010110
11100101010110111
10101101011
1111011101001
0001110001

Alright. The idea is to iterate the file on each line and add 1 to a counter (initialized with 0) if the condition is satisfied.
